author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-MIPS And POC Sweden Have Reached Settlement
text:
April 19 (Reuters) - MIPS AB:
* MIPS AND POC SWEDEN HAVE REACHED A SETTLEMENT AND WILL STRENGTHEN THEIR COOPERATION
* MIPS AND POC HAVE TODAY AGREED ON A SETTLEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ONGOING LEGAL PROCEEDINGS
* SAYS SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT DOES NOT INCLUDE ANY OBLIGATION FOR ANY PARTY TO REIMBURSE OTHER PARTY FOR COSTS INCURRED IN RELATION TO LEGAL PROCEEDINGS
* COMPANIES INTEND TO JOINTLY DEVELOP SAFER HELMETS COMBINING POC AND MIPSâ€™ STRENGTHS IN TECHNOLOGICAL INNOVATION, STYLE AND QUALITY
* COOPERATION IS ESTIMATED TO HAVE A LIMITED IMPACT ON 2018 NET SALES OF MIPS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
